stimulusHtml: Clinicians must consider a variety of factors, such as biological, environmental, and cultural, before diagnosing someone with a mental illness. Which of the following is an example of a cultural factor?
choicesHtml: Five years ago, Samantha was diagnosed with schizophrenia. Her twin sister, Savannah, is now exhibiting characteristics of the disorder.
Miremba was exposed to toxic levels of lead in early childhood. He now struggles to learn in elementary school.
Keldon is a high student who often demonstrates behaviors associated with severe depression. There are very few mental health providers in her community because few people seek their services.
Vera struggles with anorexia nervosa but her twin brother, Vernon, does not show any symptoms of the illness.
